title: "We're Better Off Together": German Chancellor Tells Donald Trump
content: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Wednesday congratulated US presidential election winner Donald Trump and urged continued close trans-Atlantic ties, telling him in English: "We're better off together".
summary: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Wednesday congratulated US presidential election winner Donald Trump and urged continued close trans-Atlantic ties, telling him in English: "We're better off together".

title: "You Can Win Against China If...": Key Remarks Made By Trump About China
content: Donald Trump on Wednesday won the US presidential election over Kamala Harris, and world leaders were swift in congratulating the Republican.
summary: Donald Trump on Wednesday won the US presidential election over Kamala Harris, and world leaders were swift in congratulating the Republican.

title: Streak Of No Woman President In US Continues. Harris Fails To Create History
content: For the second time in eight years, a woman has won the Democratic nomination for US president, only to come up short in a campaign where gender was a central issue.
summary: For the second time in eight years, a woman has won the Democratic nomination for US president, only to come up short in a campaign where gender was a central issue.

title: Who Is Usha Vance, 1st Indian-Origin Woman Set To Become Second Lady Of US
content: Moments into his victory speech on Tuesday, Trump lauded his running mate JD Vance and his Indian-American wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance.
summary: Moments into his victory speech on Tuesday, Trump lauded his running mate JD Vance and his Indian-American wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance.

title: Donald Trump Defies All Odds, Wins 2024 Election Amid Legal Battles
content: Donald Trump touted his ability to "get away with it" as a defining theme of his life story when he first ran for president in 2016 -- boasting that he could shoot someone on New York's Fifth Avenue without losing a single vote.
summary: Donald Trump touted his ability to "get away with it" as a defining theme of his life story when he first ran for president in 2016 -- boasting that he could shoot someone on New York's Fifth Avenue without losing a single vote.

title: In Trump's Victory Speech, A Shout-Out To 'Bobby' Kennedy. What It Could Be
content: Donald Trump's victory speech included a shout-out to Robert F. Kennedy Junior, hinting at a major role for him in the Trump Administration once it is set up, provided he doesn't interfere with America's oil exploration and drilling.
summary: Donald Trump's victory speech included a shout-out to Robert F. Kennedy Junior, hinting at a major role for him in the Trump Administration once it is set up, provided he doesn't interfere with America's oil exploration and drilling.

title: People From Harris' Ancestral Village Find "Saving Grace" In Her Defeat
content: Although Kamala Harris has been defeated by Donald Trump in the US presidential election, she will make a comeback as she is a fighter, said residents of Thulasendrapuram, the village of her maternal ancestors, on Wednesday.
summary: Although Kamala Harris has been defeated by Donald Trump in the US presidential election, she will make a comeback as she is a fighter, said residents of Thulasendrapuram, the village of her maternal ancestors, on Wednesday.

title: 78-Year-Old Donald Trump Oldest Person To Be Elected US President
content: Donald Trump went from being a businessman, real estate tycoon and reality TV star to becoming the country's first former US President to be declared a convicted felon.
summary: Donald Trump went from being a businessman, real estate tycoon and reality TV star to becoming the country's first former US President to be declared a convicted felon.

title: Trump's 'America First' Agenda May Lead To Tighter H-1B Visa Rules: Experts
content: With Donald Trump all set to become US president, Indian exporters may face high customs duties for goods like automobiles, textiles and pharmaceuticals if the new US administration decides to pursue the America First' agenda, opined trade experts.
summary: With Donald Trump all set to become US president, Indian exporters may face high customs duties for goods like automobiles, textiles and pharmaceuticals if the new US administration decides to pursue the America First' agenda, opined trade experts.

title: "History's Greatest Comeback": Netanyahu Congratulates Trump On Big US Win
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Tuesday congratulated Donald Trump, who claimed victory in the US presidential election, calling it "history's greatest comeback" and a new beginning in the US-Israel alliance.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Tuesday congratulated Donald Trump, who claimed victory in the US presidential election, calling it "history's greatest comeback" and a new beginning in the US-Israel alliance.

title: World Leaders Pledge To Work With Trump As He Claims US Election Win
content: World leaders raced to congratulate Donald Trump as he claimed a stunning US election victory over Kamala Harris, while financial markets also rose.
summary: World leaders raced to congratulate Donald Trump as he claimed a stunning US election victory over Kamala Harris, while financial markets also rose.

title: People From Kamala Harris' Indian Ancestral Village Express Disappointment
content: As the projections for the US Presidential elections indicate a win for Republican candidate Donald Trump, the people of Kamala Harris' ancestral Thulasendrapuram village in Tamil Nadu expressed their disappointment.
summary: As the projections for the US Presidential elections indicate a win for Republican candidate Donald Trump, the people of Kamala Harris' ancestral Thulasendrapuram village in Tamil Nadu expressed their disappointment.

title: Moments Before Trump Declares Victory, US Conducts Hypersonic Missile Test
content: Officials clarified that this test, planned years in advance, highlights nuclear readiness and US commitment to defense amid global security shifts.
summary: Officials clarified that this test, planned years in advance, highlights nuclear readiness and US commitment to defense amid global security shifts.

title: China For "Win-Win Cooperation" With US As Trump Makes A Comeback
content: China said Wednesday it hoped for "peaceful coexistence" with the United States as Donald Trump neared a decisive victory over Kamala Harris in the country's presidential election.
summary: China said Wednesday it hoped for "peaceful coexistence" with the United States as Donald Trump neared a decisive victory over Kamala Harris in the country's presidential election.

title: Why Putin May Not Congratulate Trump Over US Election Results
content: The Kremlin said Wednesday it would judge Donald Trump, who claimed victory in the US presidential election, on his actions and that President Vladimir Putin had no plans to congratulate him.
summary: The Kremlin said Wednesday it would judge Donald Trump, who claimed victory in the US presidential election, on his actions and that President Vladimir Putin had no plans to congratulate him.

title: World Leaders React To Donald Trump's "Historic Return": Who Said What
content: With Republican nominee Donald Trump just three votes short of a victory in the Presidential election, wishes from world leaders began pouring in even as he promised a "golden age for America".
summary: With Republican nominee Donald Trump just three votes short of a victory in the Presidential election, wishes from world leaders began pouring in even as he promised a "golden age for America".

title: Did Elon Musk's X Replace Like Button With Ballot Box For US Election Day?
content: Donald Trump claimed victory in the US presidential election 2024 today as according to results he is on the verge of defeating Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris. In his victory speech, he thanked tech tycoon Elon Musk.
summary: Donald Trump claimed victory in the US presidential election 2024 today as according to results he is on the verge of defeating Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris. In his victory speech, he thanked tech tycoon Elon Musk.

title: "Transactional Leader, No Surprises": Shashi Tharoor On Trump 2.0 For India
content: Congress leader Shashi Thaoor, who heads the Parliamentary Standing Committee on External Affairs, told NDTV today Donald Trump is a familiar politician who India has engaged with before.
summary: Congress leader Shashi Thaoor, who heads the Parliamentary Standing Committee on External Affairs, told NDTV today Donald Trump is a familiar politician who India has engaged with before.

title: "Deeply Sorry": Donald Trump's Niece Says She "Thought Better" Of America
content: As US election counting trends pointed to Donald Trump's comeback as President, his niece Mary L Trump said she was "deeply sorry". "I am so deeply sorry. I thought better of us," she said on X.
summary: As US election counting trends pointed to Donald Trump's comeback as President, his niece Mary L Trump said she was "deeply sorry". "I am so deeply sorry. I thought better of us," she said on X.

title: NASA Spacecraft Set For Final Venus Flyby Ahead Of Historic Sun Encounter
content: The Parker Solar Probe was launched in 2018 on the mission to "touch" the Sun. It is just about the size of a small car.
summary: The Parker Solar Probe was launched in 2018 on the mission to "touch" the Sun. It is just about the size of a small car.
